name: Trench Korps Experimental Alphas
description:
Trench Korps is a first-person shooter set during WW1 where you play as a German soldier.

Be in the trenches while being shelled by the enemy artillery, defending from the raiding enemies.

Press 1 to equip the gun

Press 2 to equip the shovel

Press 3 (once there is blood on the screen) to equip the bandage

Press R to reload

Hold C to crouch

Press the Escape key to quit
